languages.text: "Это ладья, которую надобно добыть для эттфатера? Ха, хватит на один зуб для могучего волка!"
languages.translation_comment: At the start of the boarding mission.

traits.locale_text: "Это ладья, которую надобно добыть для эттфатера? Ха, хватит на один зуб для могучего волка!"

languages.text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"
languages.translation_comment: At the start of the boarding mission.
languages.original_text: "Это ладья, которую надобно добыть для эттфатера? Ха, хватит на один зуб для могучего волка!"

traits.locale_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a bite to a mighty wolf!"
"Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a bite to a mighty wolf!"
"Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"
"Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"
"Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"
"Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

languages.text: 「これがアエット＝ヴァテルのために奪うというドレッカールか？ハッ！誇り高き狼が牙を一本突き立てる価値もない代物だな！」
languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

traits.locale_text: 「これがアエット＝ヴァテルのために奪うというドレッカールか？ハッ！誇り高き狼が牙を一本突き立てる価値もない代物だな！」

languages.text: "Ist das der Drekkar, den wir für den Aett-Vater erobern sollen? Ha! Kaum groß genug, dass ein mächtiger Wolf auch nur einen Zahn darin versenken kann!"
languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

traits.locale_text: "Ist das der Drekkar, den wir für den Aett-Vater erobern sollen? Ha! Kaum groß genug, dass ein mächtiger Wolf auch nur einen Zahn darin versenken kann!"

languages.text: « Est-ce le drekkar que nous devons prendre pour l'aett-vater ? Peuh ! Ce n'est pas une proie digne d'un puissant loup ! »
languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce le drekkar que nous devons prendre pour l'aett-vater ? Peuh ! Ce n'est pas une proie digne d'un puissant loup ! »

languages.text: «¿Es este el drekkar que debemos tomar para {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater? ¡Ja! ¡Apenas da para que este formidable lobo le hinque un diente!».
languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Es este el drekkar que debemos tomar para {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater? ¡Ja! ¡Apenas da para que este formidable lobo le hinque un diente!».

languages.text: “这就是我们要帮狼领抢的那艘撞角长船吗？哈！真是太不够看了，巨狼一口就能把它吞了。”
languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

traits.locale_text: “这就是我们要帮狼领抢的那艘撞角长船吗？哈！真是太不够看了，巨狼一口就能把它吞了。”

languages.text: "Yoksa bu, Aett-Vater için ele geçirmemiz gereken drekkar mı? Hah! Koca bir kurdun dişinin kovuğuna gitmez bu!"
languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"

traits.locale_text: "Yoksa bu, Aett-Vater için ele geçirmemiz gereken drekkar mı? Hah! Koca bir kurdun dişinin kovuğuna gitmez bu!"

languages.original_text: "Is this the drekkar we are to take for the Aett-Vater? Ha! Barely enough for a mighty wolf to sink one fang into!"
